__e: Now, look, does he belong to a club of any kind? Or does he have a lady friend?

- A man needs a partner for a thing like this.
A founding member of CTSU – Sociedade de Advogados, where he currently works as a lawyer.
He was a founding partner of the law firm Moser & Lobo d’Avila between 2010 and 2013. From 2014 to 2017, he was a partner at Telles de Abreu & Associados.

Founding Partner of CRZD Solutions in 2015. Consultant and Trainer in the area of Safety, Environment and Quality. OHSAS 18001, ISO 14001 and ISO 9001 Auditor for certification bodies. Trainer in courses of dangerous goods drivers and safety advisers.
